name: iazo
description: Initial Ape Zone Offering - Self serve initial token offering contracts

scripts.verify:bsc-testnet: truffle run verify IAZO --network bsc-testnet && truffle run verify IAZOFactory --network bsc-testnet && truffle run verify IAZOLiquidityLocker --network bsc-testnet && truffle run verify IAZOSettings --network bsc-testnet && truffle run verify IAZOUpgradeProxy --network bsc-testnet  && truffle run verify IAZOTokenTimelock --network bsc-testnet
scripts.verify:bsc: truffle run verify IAZO --network bsc && truffle run verify IAZOFactory --network bsc && truffle run verify IAZOLiquidityLocker --network bsc && truffle run verify IAZOSettings --network bsc && truffle run verify IAZOUpgradeProxy --network bsc  && truffle run verify IAZOTokenTimelock --network bsc
